extendedInfo.description: iDoo input method is a essential choice software which is specifically developed for Android mobile phone users. It not only can meets the demand of a variety of users, but also makes the consumer's experience to be better. As a simple and generous, fashion and aesthetic software, iDoo has many fresh and funny functions, such as: It supports users to input words in more than 46 languages smartly and to update many popular lexicons; And then, It also has a function of the fashion and pretty theme pictures' downloading, which allows users DIY the out of the ordinary theme picture belongs to themselves. iDoo input method has the fast input characteristic and makes your input experience to be different.  One World, One Input.  â¢Support over 46 languages and switch languages with one key.  â¢Fast input without any difficulty and massive treasures.  â¢Flexible design of soft keyboard with flexible moveâMain Features  â½Multi-languages support    ââOne Worldï¼One Input  iDoo Input method supports over 80 languages in the worldï¼which help you realize the dream of communicating with the world.  â½Change theme  ââVisual enjoyment with massive themes  iDoo  input method provides numerous themes for your selection and make mobile input a real pleasure. In addition, allow us to use local pictures as the keyboard background image or downloaded DIY themes making your keypad unique.   â½Fast input symbols  ââFlexible and light ballet on fingertips   Slide up from character keys, and then contents of additional silk screen will be displayed on screen. For example, if sliding H upwards, â%â of additional silk screen will be displayed on screen. â½Switching keypad  ââGorgeous change of keyboard  Switch different keypads of the same language by sliding the keypad area from right to left or vise versa. For example, QWERTY keypad in English, switch it to ITUT keypad by sliding to right. âBasic function â½Word stock update  Support online word stock updateï¼to obtain the latest popular word stock â½Language switching  Slide space key up to show language names, slide to left to show previous language, and slide to right to show next language.  â½Word prediction  Provide intelligent word prediction by analyzing sentence context upon characters entered by users.  â½Dynamically sort words  Automatically sort words upon on userâs input habit.  â½Phrase association  Carry out phrase association prediction by analyzing sentence context upon characters entered by users. â½Save created words  Save user-defined words so as to facilitate input.  â½Automatically capitalize the 1st character of a sentence  By analyzing application situation, automatically switch the input status to uppercase, and then automatically switch back to lowercase upon input contents without help of reviews.comment: hi I changed from5 * to 3 * . Initially marathi chars were aligned; now not\tVery good for devnagri script; num lock and shift key to improve; some char missing in std layout  But good suggestion support
